Wisdom: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ عَزِيمَةُ الْإِيمَانِ وَفَاتِحَةُ الْإِحْسَانِ وَمَرْضَاةُ الرَّحْمَنِ وَمَدْحَرَةُ الشَّيْطَانِ
enWisdom: ‘There is no God but Allah’ is the declaration of faith, the first step towards good deeds and acquiring the pleasure of the Most Merciful, and a means of repelling Satan
Belief that Allah is one means that you should not [try to] imagine [Him]

Wisdom: كُلُّ مُسَمًّى بِالْوَحْدَةِ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ قَلِيلٌ
enWisdom: Everyone who is called ‘one’ other than Allah, the Glorified, is little; and every honoured one other than Him is inferior; and every strong one other than Him is weak; and every master other than Him is a slave; and every knower other than Him is a learner; and every capable one other than Him is sometimes able and other times unable

Wisdom: لَوْ كَانَ لِرَبِّكَ شَرِيكٌ لَأَتَتْكَ رُسُلُهُ
enWisdom: If your Lord had a partner, then his prophets would [also] have come to you
One who knows Allah believes in his oneness

Wisdom: مَنْ وَحَّدَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ لَمْ يُشَبِّهْهُ بِالْخَلْقِ
enWisdom: One who believes in the oneness of Allah, the Glorified, does not compare Him to the creation

Wisdom: كُلُّ مَالِكٍ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ مَمْلُوكٌ
enWisdom: Every master other than  Allah is a slave

Wisdom: لَمْ يَخْلُقِ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ الْخَلْقَ لِوَحْشَةٍ وَلَمْ يَسْتَعْمِلْهُمْ لِمَنْفَعَةٍ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, did not create the creation on account of loneliness, nor did He command them [to obey Him] in order to gain anything
